text: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
author: Jean Ingelow

text: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be manufactured. Not real glamour it's based on femininity.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: When I am working on a problem, I never think about beauty but when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller
